A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Upon seeing the movie\, all I can say is that the effects were good\,but not much else. Being a Star Wars fan since the age of 5 made this experience hurt so much more. Unless there are some serious plot changes in the next installment\, I will not be seeing it. What hurts even more though is the fact that they have succeeded in disappointing the greatest Star Was fan of them all( my childhood hero as well) Mark Hamill
